root.name: Ganbare Pennant Race!
root.description: OverviewGanbare Pennant Race! is a NES baseball game from Konami. It is not a sequel to Exciting Baseball, Konami's only other baseball game for the system, but rather a new game that features cameos from other Konami games and characters from its popular Ganbare Goemon series. Specifically, the fictional team of "Konami Goemontai" is a team comprised entirely of Goemons.Other fictional teams include: Donuts, Gyruss, Caps, Swimmers, Walls, Targets, Lighters, Bubbles, Harps, Flowers, Brains, Olives and Konami Kurokotai.
